headline: Carrier Announces Investment in Thermal Solutions Provider ZutaCore, Advancing the Development of Next-Gen Data Center Cooling Solutions
summary: Carrier Global Corporation (NYSE: CARR), global leader in intelligent climate and energy solutions, today announced that its venture group, Carrier Ventures, is leading an investment and technology partnership with ZutaCore®, a disruptive innovator of two-phase direct-to-chip liquid cooling technology for data centers. This investment aligns with Carrier's strategy of providing high-tech, integrated cooling solutions to meet the critical cooling needs of data center customers. The global data ce
